DOC.criteria: 1 . Signed Informed Consent 2 . Target population : Healthy male female . 3 . Women child bear potential ( WOCBP ) negative serum pregnancy test 4 . Women must breastfeed 5 . Men WOCBP must agree follow instruction contraception 1 . History chronic acute illness , gastrointestinal disease , GI surgery , cardiac disease clinically significant cardiac arrhythmia 2 .
